import { Container,Button,Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import Input from "./Input.js"; import Topbar from "./Topbar"; import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function CenterSubject() { const [state, setState] = useState({ book_name: "", Author_Introduction: "", Meaning_of_Revelation: "", History_of_Quran_Revelation: "", History_of_Preservation_of_Quran: "", Misconceptions_about_Tafsir: "", surah: { name: "", number: "", versesNumber: "", verses: "", summary: "", ancillary_issues: "", }, }); return ( <>
BIG DATA
 ); }
